relevant_findings: Crusted sores on both upper thighs and right axilla consistent with impetigo
Acanthosis nigricans in the axillae and around the neck

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: The patient was no longer taking metformin due to intolerance but remained on insulin. Blood glucose concentrations remained above target levels at 10–13 mmol/L.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Blood glucose concentrations above target levels persisted, indicating a lack of improvement in glycemic control.
